title: Truth Be Told, MTH, Sheryl Underwood, OCD and more.
itunes:title: Truth Be Told, MTH, Sheryl Underwood, OCD and more.
description:
Good morning and welcome to the ride!  The CEO is in a foot race against poverty.  What are the stupid things people say in the movies?  Junior is back with Truth Be Told and we get into testimonies.  Fool #2 murders another one in the spirit of Bell Biv DeVoe.  We hear Junior's guidelines for hood Halloween costumes.  Sheryl Underwood stops by to keep herself on the top of Junior's mind.  Tommy and Junior to head to head in Right or Wrong with Wonderlove as the judge.  The crew talk about their OCD tendencies.  Today in Closing Remarks, Steve speaks about us getting critical about our happiness and so much more.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
